title._content: Image taken from page 130 of 'Paris, ses vues, places, monuments, theâtres, etc. contenant environ 300 reproductions d'après des dessins originaux ... Introduction par L. de Fourcaud'

description._content: Image taken from: Title: "Paris, ses vues, places, monuments, theâtres, etc. contenant environ 300 reproductions d'après des dessins originaux ... Introduction par L. de Fourcaud" Author: DUMAS, François Guillaume. Contributor: FOURCAUD, Louis de. Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 010171.f.14." Page: 130 Place of Publishing: Paris Date of Publishing: 1889 Issuance: monographic Identifier: 001002894 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
